price: ហើយគ្មានក្រុមណាមួយអាចជួយគេក្រៅពីអល់ឡោះ ឡើយ។ ហើយគេក៏មិនអាចជួយខ្លួនឯងបានដែរ។
arabic: وَلَمۡ تَكُن لَّهُۥ فِئَةٞ يَنصُرُونَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانَ مُنتَصِرًا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: walam takun lahu fi-atun yanṣurūnahu min dūni al-lahi wamā kāna muntaṣiran
